participants.name: Jamie Allen
participants.title: Senior Professional Recruiter at Apex Systems

messages.message:
Direct Hire Cloud Architect in Phoenix, AZ

I came across your resume today online and I wanted to reach out to you as I currently have an opportunity available with a large client in the Phoenix area. Based on your skill set, it appears that you would be a great candidate for the position. If you could either respond to this email, or give me a call at the number below, I would like to run the details of the position by you. Candidates must be eligible to work in the US without sponsorship and must have experience within Azure or AWS, Cloud and .NET.

I look forward to speaking with you soon.

Regards,


Jamie Allen, Senior Professional Recruiter
Apex Systems
16435 N Scottsdale Rd Ste 130 Scottsdale, AZ 85254
Office: 480-368-2480 | Fax: 480-368-2481
jallen@apexsystemsinc.com| www.apexsystems.com

Jamie Allen | Professional Recruiter| Apex Systems
16435 N Scottsdale Rd Ste 130 Scottsdale, AZ 85254
